title: Add Invoice
intro:
Click the 'Add Invoice' button to open the modal that you can use to add new invoices when you receive from your supplier.
You can add just one or multiple invoices.

title: Invoice Number
intro: On the 'Invoice' column, it'll be displayed the invoice number sent by your supplier.

title: Invoice File
intro: On the 'File' column, if you attached any file when creating the invoice, an icon with a link to that file will be displayed.

title: Invoice Items
intro:
On the 'Items' column, will be displayed all the items that were part of the invoice (one per row).
You also have some helpful info regarding the item (like how many items are still not invoiced).

title: Item Cost
intro: On the 'Cost' column, you can set the cost for each item in the current invoice.

title: Item Discount
intro: On the 'Discount' column, you can set the discount applied to each item in the current invoice (if any).

title: Item Qty
intro: On the 'Qty' column, you can set the number of invoiced items for each row.

title: Item Tax
intro: On the 'Tax' column, you can set the tax for every invoiced item (if any).
